860120.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Reloaded: Dead Men Walkin' (Savage Worlds)
860120.description:
Deadlands Reloaded: Dead Men Walkin

Some tales werent meant to be told. This is one of them. Every unfortunate soul who experiences this yarn of horror on the High Plains will die. Thats a fact. And it will happen in fast, amigo.
Tread carefully. The dead walk here.
This is Shane Hensley's personal convention adventure he usually runs by invitation only for players up for a little more abuse and mayhem than usual.
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Scott Geeding
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Scott Geeding
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
